name: @elaraai/east-ui-platform
description: East UI Platform - Platform functions for East UI state management

scripts.package: npm run build && mkdir -p .package && npm pack --pack-destination .package
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && node --enable-source-maps --test 'dist/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && npm run lint && node --enable-source-maps --test --experimental-test-coverage 'dist/**/*.spec.js'

author: Elara AI Pty Ltd
